Wolfblade::

She smiled a bit, and relaxed, just a bit. "Look, we're all on the
same side. A Warrior's code is his bond and his word. By the Old
Warrior's Code of Cybertron, I will not shoot unless shot at first.
There, happy now?" She let a slightly playful smirk cross her face
plates.  She wanted to know that she would give a sign of trust.
She looked over and smiled at Malice. Her optics gave him a loving
flash, then she looked at her two new comrads in arms. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice/ Hellplague:
>  
> The chrome finish bot merely gave Wolfblade's hand a squeeze.  He
had no intention of disarming her, she wouldn't need it.
>  
> "If you would, you two, put your weapon cores in a compartment or
something, so there is no 'accidental shooting' your weapons in the
base.  Just a precaution so Rodimus does not read me the riot act when
I bring you two back."
>  
>  
> Hellplague sighed,a nd after a bit of work, pulled the weapon cores
for her disruptors out of the arm mounted weapons and put them in a
compartment behinder her back.
>  
> "You too, Celeron, we have top play by their rules."
> 
>
